description:
Use this value pack to pepper your wall with hateful pinches, heinous crimps and powerful pockets in-between your T-nutted holds. Their small size makes them best suited to advanced climbers, or beginners on more vertical terrain. They can be used as larger footholds on the steeps, too.

  • Made of polyurethane
  • 40 holds and wood screws included
  • Sorry, no colour choice
name: Metolius PU Greatest Chips Screw On Holds
